mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_medicine
order by ${orderByClause}
select * from tb_medicine where c2=#{classifyName} ORDER BY goods_id LIMIT #{start},15
select * from tb_medicine where ${scope} like #{content} ORDER BY goods_id LIMIT #{start},15
select * from tb_medicine where goods_name=#{content} limit 1
select * from tb_medicine where bar_code=#{bar_code} limit 1
